csw.services.config.api.javadsl

Interface IConfigClientService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IConfigService

    public interface IConfigClientService
    Defines an interface to be used by clients for retrieving configuration information

    • Method Summary

      • getActive

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<ConfigData>> getActive(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Gets and returns the content of active version of the file stored under the given path.

        Parameters:
        path - the file path relative to the repository root
        Returns:
        a future object that can be used to access the file's data, if found
